s15.message: Can be installed in Songbird 0.3 now

s9.message: Toolbar icon now looses its drop marker in vertical toolbars like the one created by All-In-One Sidebar extension to prevent resizing of the toolbar, menu available with a right-click then (forum thread)

s8.message: Improved check for objects opened on its own (tabs shouldn't be shown for these objects)

s3.message: Improved storage of internal data, old way was less efficient and potentially insecure (bug 15758)

s2.message: SeaMonkey: Major security issue fixed — switched on XPCNativeWrappers that aren't used by default for some reason

s10.message: Firefox: Default placement of the toolbar icon is now the right edge of the navigation toolbar (forum thread)

s16.message: Removed obsolete file property from install manifest (not required for Firefox 1.5 and higher)

s5.message: "Show tabs on Flash and Java" again can be used when JavaScript is disabled (bug 15637)

s6.message: Made it harder for web sites to tamper with tabs on objects like Flash or Java

s13.message: Using Gecko's built-in feature for scrolling to node when selecting in the sidebar — should be less error-prone

s4.message: Made sure that web pages constantly reloading images won't increase memory usage (bug 15317)

s12.message: Added methods addPatterns() and removePatterns() to the public IAdblockPlus interface (can be used from other extensions)

s7.message: Made tab displayed by "Show tabs on Flash and Java" a link (because of the context menu and ability to middle-click, bug 15638)

s11.message: "Disable Adblock Plus on ..." options are no longer disabled when Preferences dialog is open

s14.message: No longer relying on extension version reported by the browser (is unreliable in SeaMonkey, forum thread)
